________________________________________________________________________________________

The "Windows XP - Windows Genuine Advantage" Patch a.k.a. (The "Un"-Official Windows
Genuine Advantage "Hot"-Fix) is a FREE package that allows You to Disable/Install
Windows Genuine Advantage Easily.  You will want to Disable "WGA" so as to gain RAM back
and for less Spyware "WGA" running in the background.  You will want to Install WGA if
the Auto Update Client fails to download any new Windows XP Updates.  Hence it&#039;s like a
Windows XP Auto Update Client Enabler.  This Patch will Restart your computer once
finished Disabling/Installing Windows Genuine Advantage on your system.  By using this
Patch "You" Agree to allow this Patch to Restart your system, as well as any
Consequences for any Use/Misuse/Illegal Use of this product.


WGA Patch allows for you to do the following:

	* Disable Windows Genuine Advantage
	* Install Windows Genuine Advantage

	Although relatively new at this, I just had to contribute back.  I wanted to
	contribute something relatively new, nice, and handy.  I wanted to assist
	other people with Technical Difficulties.  I felt that the "Windows Genuine
	Advantage" was a good place to start.  It was already a damn good Problem.  Now
	it&#039;s an even better Resolve.

	I plan to be around awhile, so keep a look out for more of my CONTRIBUTIONS!!!
